Question
========

A report of a math exam shows that the score distribution has has a mean score of 78 and a standard deviation of 10. Define the scores of two students who have, respectively, a standardized score (*z* score) of -0.6 and 1.2.

Answerlist
----------

* -0.6 and 1.2
* 72 and 90
* 78 and 68
* 84 and 66

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.6 and 1.2: Incorrect
* 72 and 90: Correct
* 78 and 68: Incorrect
* 84 and 66: Incorrect
